entities.description: The code associated with various criminal offenses as classified by the Uniform Crime Reporting (UCR) program.
The name or description of the criminal offense.
The unweighted frequency count of the specified offense.
The percentage representation of the specified offense based on frequency.

relationships.description: Associates a criminal offense with its corresponding UCR offense code.
Relates the UCR offense code to its descriptive offense name.
Specifies the frequency of the criminal offense as observed in the survey.
Indicates the percentage of the criminal offense.
